The Design of a Template Structure for a Generalized Data Structure Definition Facility (BGC), pp. 408–413.
ICSE-1976-DreyfusK #development
The Preliminary Design as a Key to Successful Software Development (JMD, PJK), pp. 206–213.
ICSE-1976-Fabry #how #on the fly
How to Design a System in Which Modules Can Be Changed on the Fly (RSF), pp. 470–476.
ICSE-1976-GauldingL #development #process #realtime
Process Design Engineering: A Methodology for Real-Time Software Development (SNG, JDL), pp. 80–85.
ICSE-1976-GoudaM #analysis #modelling #on the #protocol
On the Modelling, Analysis and Design of Protocols — A Special Class of Software Structures (MGG, EGM), pp. 256–262.
ICSE-1976-Green #synthesis
The Design of the PSI Program Synthesis System (CCG), pp. 4–18.
ICSE-1976-GuttagHM #data type #specification
The Design of Data Type Specifications (JVG, EH, DRM), pp. 414–420.
ICSE-1976-Hsiao #experience #implementation #re-engineering
A Software Engineering Experience in the Management, Design and Implementation of A Data Secure System (DKH), pp. 532–538.
ICSE-1976-Koppang #development #process #set #tool support
Process Design System: An Integrated Set of Software Development Tools (RGK), pp. 86–90.
ICSE-1976-ParnasHW #operating system #product line #set #specification #system family
Design and Specification of the Minimal Subset of an Operating System Family (Abstract) (DLP, GH, HW), p. 123.
ICSE-1976-PhillipsB #realtime #verification
Design and Verification of Real-Time Systems (JVP, THB), pp. 124–131.
ICSE-1976-Voges #aspect-oriented #validation
Aspects of Design, Test and Validation of the Software for a Computerized Reactor Protection System (UV), pp. 606–610.
ICSE-1976-WensleyGLS #analysis #fault tolerance #verification
The Design, Analysis, and Verification of the SIFT Fault-Tolerant System (JHW, MWG, KNL, RES), pp. 458–469.
ICSE-1976-Wexelblat #how #programming
Maxims for Malfeasant Designers, or How to Design Languages to Make Programming as Difficult as Possible (RLW), pp. 331–336.
ICSE-1976-WhiteB #approach #towards
Towards and Engineering Approach to Software Design (JRW, TLB), pp. 214–222.
ICSE-1976-WilhelmRCGLN #compilation #evaluation #generative
Design Evaluation of the Compiler Generating System MUGI (RW, KR, JC, HG, WL, RN), pp. 571–576.
ICSE-1976-YauCC #approach
An Approach to Error-Resistant Software Design (SSY, RCC, DCC), pp. 429–436.
POPL-1976-JonesM #optimisation #programming language
Binding Time Optimization in Programming Languages: Some Thoughts Toward the Design of an Ideal Language (NDJ, SSM), pp. 77–94.
POPL-1976-Ruth #automation
Automatic Design of Data Processing Systems (GRR), pp. 50–57.
SOSP-J-1975-LampsonS76 #operating system
Reflections on an Operating System Design (BWL, HES), pp. 251–265.
POPL-1975-Ligler #approach
A Mathematical Approach to Language Design (GTL), pp. 41–53.
SOSP-1975-AkkoyunluEH #constraints #network
Some Constraints and Tradeoffs in the Design of Network Communications (EAA, KE, RVH), pp. 67–74.
SOSP-J-1973-Liskov72 #operating system
The Design of the Venus Operating System (BL), pp. 144–149.
SIGIR-1971-WangL #evaluation #file system
Quantitative Evaluation of Design Tradeoffs in File Systems (CPW, VYL), pp. 155–162.
SOSP-1971-Liskov #operating system
The Design of the Venus Operating System (BL), pp. 11–16.
STOC-1970-Lindstrom #incremental #parsing
The Design of Parsers for Incremental Language Processors (GL), pp. 81–91.
SOSP-1969-Mealy
The system design cycle (GHM), pp. 1–7.
SOSP-1969-NeedhamH #operating system #theory and practice
Theory and practice in operating system design (RMN, DFH), pp. 8–12.
SOSP-1967-Fuchel68 #multi
Considerations in the design of a multiple computer system with extended core storage (KF), pp. 334–340.

Hosted as a part of SLEBOK on GitHub.
